node.title: Andreas Rasmussen takes on the new role as CGO of Monstar Lab Group.
node.description: Nodes’ CEO takes on a new role as Monstar Lab’s Chief Growth Officer. In his new role, he will focus on generating growth and developing a unified company culture across all offices.
